attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It would seem that in this country the governments solution to alot of things is just to make it illegal. Laws on alcohol being one of them.

When I turn 18 in a few weeks, alcohol is going to become amazingly easy to get hold of and get ridiculously drunk from. I'm most excited about it because I haven't been "allowed" to for 18 years so I feel a good binge is in order!

In many other European coutries none of this is an issue because by the time the citizens are 18 it isnt a novelty and the excitement isnt there, and alcohol is respected.

The more relaxed the laws are, the less young people will simply want the fun of rebelling.

A group of my friends who are 16 and 17 are going out for a meal next week and liked the idea of having a glass of red with it. I explained that was no longer legal without a parent/guardian present so they are off to buy bottles of vodka instead.

I would love to see how many people agree on this issue as it is certainly one I'm very passionate about!
